description: Even the toughest freeriding conditions are no match for this hardshell bib. The Gore-Tex Pro membrane and recycled nylon outer fabric offer ultra-durable protection from storms and wet weather, while keeping things breathable for the climb. The ergonomic fit and relaxed freeride look offer full freedom of movement. The bib features a dedicated avalanche transceiver pocket. The Eiger Free Pro HS bib pants are your key to freedom on the mountain.
name: Mammut Eiger Free Pro HS Bib Pants, Short - Mens

specs.value: Robust double weave fabric with four-way stretch
